summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1626, for the improvement of West 53rd Street, in the City of Seattle, from 15th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 17335 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
